entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
